00055 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 |   PLT_CtrlPointGetDescriptionTask class
00057 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00062 class PLT_CtrlPointGetDescriptionTask : public PLT_HttpClientSocketTask
00063 {
00064 public:
00065     PLT_CtrlPointGetDescriptionTask(const NPT_HttpUrl&       url,
00066                                     PLT_CtrlPoint*           ctrl_point,
00067                                     PLT_DeviceDataReference& root_device);
00068     virtual ~PLT_CtrlPointGetDescriptionTask();
00069 
00070 protected:
00071     // PLT_HttpClientSocketTask methods
00072     NPT_Result ProcessResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00073                                const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00074                                const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context, 
00075                                NPT_HttpResponse*             response);
00076 
00077 protected:
00078     PLT_CtrlPoint*          m_CtrlPoint;
00079     PLT_DeviceDataReference m_RootDevice;
00080 };

00082 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 |   PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest class
00084 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 class PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest : public NPT_HttpRequest
00090 {
00091 public:
00092     PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest(const char* url,
00093                                 const char* method = "GET",
00094                                 const char* protocol = NPT_HTTP_PROTOCOL_1_1) : // 1.1 for pipelining
00095         NPT_HttpRequest(url, method, protocol) {}
00096     virtual ~PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest() {}
00097 
00098     // members
00099     PLT_DeviceDataReference m_Device;
00100 };
00101 
00102 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 |   PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask class
00104 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00109 class PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask : public PLT_HttpClientSocketTask
00110 {
00111 public:
00112     PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask(PLT_CtrlPoint* ctrl_point);
00113     virtual ~PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask();
00114 
00115     NPT_Result AddSCPDRequest(PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest* request) {
00116         return PLT_HttpClientSocketTask::AddRequest((NPT_HttpRequest*)request);
00117     }
00118 
00119     // override to prevent calling this directly
00120     NPT_Result AddRequest(NPT_HttpRequest*) {
00121         // only queuing PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest allowed
00122         return NPT_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00123     }
00124 
00125 protected:
00126     // PLT_HttpClientSocketTask methods
00127     NPT_Result ProcessResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00128                                const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00129                                const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context, 
00130                                NPT_HttpResponse*             response);   
00131 
00132 protected:
00133     PLT_CtrlPoint* m_CtrlPoint;
00134 };
00135

00198 public:

00200                                     PLT_CtrlPoint*           ctrl_point, 
00201                                     PLT_DeviceDataReference& device,
00202                                     PLT_Service*             service,
00203                                     void*                    userdata = NULL);
00204     virtual ~PLT_CtrlPointSubscribeEventTask();
00205     
00206 protected:
00207     // PLT_HttpClientSocketTask methods
00208     NPT_Result ProcessResponse(NPT_Result                    res, 
00209                                const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00210                                const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context, 
00211                                NPT_HttpResponse*             response);
00212 
00213 protected:
00214     PLT_CtrlPoint*          m_CtrlPoint;
00215     PLT_Service*            m_Service;
00216     PLT_DeviceDataReference m_Device; // force to keep a reference to device owning m_Service
00217     void*                   m_Userdata;
00218 };
